relation.text: receive from me the smallest hint that I can have any views from that quarter
now repaid you with the best in my power and unask 'd ; this is the privilege of a friend , you no sooner call
avail myself of that privilege . Captain Cathcart has been with us in Dublin near three weeks
remember 'd to you I am Dear Miſs Hamilton , Your faithful & Affection-te Uncle Frederick Hamilton Sackville Street March 14
